name: GGJ 2021 - Fairy Lost
description:
Explore a mysterious magical forest as a lost fairy on her way back home. Encounter mythical creatures and help them find what they lost. 

Made for the the Global Game Jam 2021

By 

Danae Dekker - Music & Audio

Ronald van Egdom - Pixel Art, Visual Effects, Programming.

Kian Kreikamp - 3D Modeling, Level Design.

Maiko Steeman - Programming, Puzzle Design.

Daphne Zwarts - 3D Modeling, Animation, Texturing Assistance, UI.
